meanings.definition: An idea or plan put forward for consideration.
meanings.sent1: She offered some helpful suggestions for the project.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, they discussed various suggestions for the event.
meanings.sent3: His suggestion to have a pizza party was met with cheers.
meanings.sent4: The suggestion of painting the room blue really brightened up the space.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's suggestion to read more books sparked her love for literature.

meanings.sent1: Her quick suggestions helped improve the workflow.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your suggestions on how to solve the issue.
meanings.sent3: The cat's suggestion to chase its tail was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His suggestion to dance in the rain was a bold move.
meanings.sent5: The chef's suggestion to add more spices made the dish delicious.

meanings.sent1: There were suggestions of a smile on her face.
meanings.sent2: The faint suggestions of rain clouds in the sky hinted at a storm.
meanings.sent3: The ghostly figure left only a slight suggestion of its presence.
meanings.sent4: The old map gave suggestions of hidden treasure on the island.
meanings.sent5: The aroma in the air gave a strong suggestion of freshly baked bread.
